summary: In original mod http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59164/? human parts can be found in corpes of all creatures. This mod fixes that probem.
descriptionHtml:
In original mod http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59164/? human parts can be found in corpes of all creatures. This mod fixes that probem.

Bug thanks for  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1201666]fatmanmagister[/url] for creating original mod and for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/42524]Ebonhawke[/url] for providing solution. I've just created a fix and share it for all who are affraid of using Creation Kit. :)
author: Kamil Wojcik
